title: Build Your Piatto
description: Craft your perfect Italian bowl, built fresh just for you. Choose your protein: Herbed Roasted Chicken, Braised Beef Stracotto, Sausage & Peppers, Garlic Shrimp, or Eggplant & Mushroom Veggie. Pair with creamy Risotto or Polenta and Cannellini or Borlotti Beans. Finish with Bruschetta Topping, Grated Parmesan, Peperonata, or Basil Pesto for an authentic taste of Italy.
